entities.name: runcorn
entities.description: Runcorn is mentioned by Mr. Weasley as someone who faked his family tree.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is accused by Mr. Weasley of being a wizard who faked his family tree.

entities.name: dirk cresswell
entities.description: Dirk Cresswell is mentioned as someone ten times the wizard Harry is.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley accuses Runcorn of faking his family tree, and by extension, accuses Harry of the same.
Mr. Weasley compares Dirk Cresswell's wizarding ability to that of Harry, stating that Cresswell is ten times the wizard Harry is.
